Description: Verify user can login with valid username and password
Test Steps: Open login page -> Enter valid email -> Enter valid password -> Click Login
Expected Result: User should be logged in successfully and redirected to dashboard

Description: Verify error message when password is incorrect
Test Steps: Open login page -> Enter valid email -> Enter wrong password -> Click Login
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed and login should fail

Description: Verify validation messages for empty login fields
Test Steps: Open login page -> Click Login without entering any data
Expected Result: Validation messages should be displayed for required fields

Preconditions: User email must exist in system
Test Steps: Click Forgot Password -> Enter registered email -> Click Submit
Expected Result: Password reset email should be sent to user
User should be logged out and redirected to login page
